page.title: 01Introductory
page.content:
Domesday SURVEY 03200195, centres on Newbridge,Gwent.Newbridge is a South Wales mining community with two colleries,North and South Celynen.South is due to close in the summer of 1985.There are other mines outside our survey area,to which some miners will be transferred.Women in the area tend to be employed in light industries,such as AB Electronics situated just outside the survey area,the North and South.There is serious unemployment affecting young people in the region. Part of the survey is rough common land,and part is on the fringe of the Forestry commission in coniferous forests.
{ }
